projects.title: SmartStore
projects.description: Technology marketplace with shopping cart, payments simulator and registration forms for users and products.

projects.title: Pawsome Friends
projects.description: Website for adoption of abandoned pets. Includes a Home page, a pets catalog with search filters, and an admin control panel for pet shelters.

projects.title: Issue Tracker
projects.description: An app to enhance performance of HTTP requests, with caching, server state management and error handling, using Axios and TanStack Query libraries.

projects.title: TicTapToe
projects.description: Cool looking tic tac toe game developed from scratch, features a neumorphic design, scores bar autosave, shape and starting player switches, as well as local storage of scores.
